credit_line: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
title: Design for Wedding Canopy
medium: White chalk, pen and brown ink on brown textured paper
description: Canopy design in the form of a horizontal, fringed shawl with a six-pointed star on right end and four Hebrew characters ["Shin"] at left end.  Beneath design is small image of canopy supported on four poles.
name: Drawing
